column2: "Woyinom nye asaase no do ahemfo a Israelmba no kunkum hɔn
column3: na wɔfaa hɔn asaase wɔ Jordan egya a ɔdze kɔ wipuei no
column4: ofi Arnon ɔbɔnmu dze kodu bepɔw Hermon ho
column5: nye Araba nyinara boka afamu no."

column3: na odzii hen fi Aroer a ɔda Arnon ɔbɔn ano
column4: nye kurow a ɔwɔ ɔbɔn no ne finimfin
column5: nye Gilead ɔfa no araa dze kodu esutsen Jabbok ho

column2: "nye Araba dze kodu Kinnerot po no ho
column5: Bɛt-jesimot kwan do; nye pomu afamu
column6: wɔ Pisga no nkokonyiadze ase no:"

column2: "nye Basanhen Ɔge a ofi Refafo nkaa no mu a ɔtsenaa Astarot nye Edrei no ne he do
column4: "na odzii hen wɔ bepɔw Hermon do
column7: dze kodu Gersurfo nye Maakatfo he do
column9: wɔ Hesbon hen Sihon he do."

column2: "EWURADZE n’akowaa Moses nye Israelmba no kaa hɔn gui: na EWURADZE n’akowaa Moses dze maa Reubenfo
column4: nye Manaasɛ ebusuakuw ɔfa no dɛ enyadze."

column2: "Na woyinom nye asaase no do ahemfo a Josua nye Israelmba no kunkum hɔn wɔ Jordan egya anee afamu
column3: ofi Baal-gad wɔ Lebanon ɔbɔn no araa dze kodu bepɔw Halak a ɔfow kɔ Seir ho no; na Josua dze maa Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw dɛ enyadze dɛ mbrɛ hɔn nkyekyɛmu no tsetsee;"
Ai a ɔwɔ Bɛtɛl ne nkyɛn no

column14: "nye Tirza ahemfo. Ahemfo no nyinara wɔyɛ eduasa biako."
